void PCIEAppPrcmConfig (void)
 This API configures the PCIeSS1 PLL and clocks, resets the PCIeSS1 and configures PHY. More...
 

Detailed Description

Source file containing the PCIe IP related configuration functions. These functions will be called by example applications.

Function Documentation

void PCIEAppPrcmConfig ( void  )

This API configures the PCIeSS1 PLL and clocks, resets the PCIeSS1 and configures PHY.

Parameters
none.
Returns
none.
